nodes.text: The TTS20-series dialectic droid, produced by Industrial Automaton, was designed to combine elements of educational and instructor droids as well as lecturing. Industrial Automaton modified their TTS15-series education and tutorial droid with further communications modules, programmed in many styles of debate. Individual TTS20 units often developed more quarrelsome personalities, but some owners of the droids saw the error as an added feature. The TTS20 was encased within a laminanium shell.
